CORE_CONFIG_TXT_01: Reflect the changes to the control scheme? This will overwrite the customized controls.

The following actions are not mapped to a button.
Do you want to proceed with this configuration anyway?
CORE_CONFIG_TXT_04: You must assign a button to open the system menu.
CORE_CONFIG_TXT_06:
This will restore all settings to their default values, except for the language and screen settings. 
Are you sure?
CORE_CONFIG_TXT_08: Some buttons are overlapping. Please assign duplicates to separate buttons.
CORE_SYS_DIALOG_03: Unable to detect the Xbox One wireless controller. Please reconnect it to resume play.
CORE_NAMEENTRY_TXT_02: This includes prohibited words. Please choose a new name.
CORE_NAMEENTRY_TXT_03: This includes prohibited symbols (%, \, ", '). Please choose a new name.
CORE_NAMEENTRY_TXT_04: You must enter a name of two characters or longer.
CORE_PSV_SKILL_HELP_245: Auto-use healing item if HP drops below 30%. Heals 15% more.
CORE_PSV_SKILL_HELP_338: An android's central system. Removal means death.
CORE_PSV_SKILL_HELP_343: Display the skill gauge. (Shows a Pod program's cooldown time.)
CORE_PSV_SKILL_HELP_347: Display an icon in areas where you can save.
CORE_PSV_SKILL_HELP_348: Display the values of damage dealt and received.
CORE_PSV_SKILL_HELP_349: Display text showing your current objectives.
CORE_PSV_SKILL_HELP_350: Auto-hide HUD elements in certain situations.
CORE_PSV_SKILL_HELP_354: Auto-attack hostile enemies in melee range.
CORE_PSV_SKILL_HELP_355: Auto-fire projectiles at nearby hostile enemies.
CORE_PSV_SKILL_HELP_357: Auto-activate Pod programs near hostile enemies.
CORE_PSV_SKILL_HELP_358: Auto-switch weapons when attacking at close range.
CORE_TUTORIAL_0001:
The System Menu allows you to check intel, change gear, adjust settings, and more.

* Tutorial messages like this one can be accessed at any time from the Intel tab.
CORE_SYS_DIALOG_07:
This will close the game and apply the settings.
Is that okay?
CORE_TUTORIAL_0005: The mini-map shows the geography around your current location at the bottom right of the screen. The <MAP_GOAL> icon shows your objective, so make sure to follow it if you get lost.
CORE_SYS_DIALOG_08: You cannot start this game because the required data has not been installed yet.
CORE_TITLE_DIALOG_00: To continue playing with the same save data you used to complete the game, select Continue and load that save data.
CORE_TITLE_DIALOG_01:
Do you want to use auto-control chips?
This will equip Auto-Attack, Auto-Fire,
Auto-Evade, Auto-Program, and 
Auto-Weapon Switch.
CORE_KEYCONFIG_01: Lock on (Hold down and press <KC_CAMERA_L_2><ICON_SLASH_2><KC_CAMERA_R_2> to switch targets)
CORE_KEYCONFIG_02: Lock on (Hold down and press <KC_CAMERA_L_3><ICON_SLASH_3><KC_CAMERA_R_3> to switch targets)
CORE_AUTO_CHIP_00: This chip can only be equipped on Easy mode.
CORE_AUTO_CHIP_01:
Equipped auto-control chips.
<KC_LOCKON_2> has now changed from "lock-on" to "toggle auto-control."
CORE_AUTO_CHIP_02:
All auto-control chips have been removed.
You can now use <KC_LOCKON_2> to lock on, and <KC_LOCKON_2><ICON_PLUS_2><KC_LOCK_CHANGE_2> to switch targets.
CORE_TITLE_DIALOG_02:
Do you want to use auto-control chips?
* Your current chip set type will be changed to "Balance Focus."

Equipped auto-control chips.
